DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective evaluate efficacy rosuvastatin therapy plasma lipid profile ( Low Density Lipoprotein ( LDL ) , High-Density Lipoprotein ( HDL ) , total cholesterol , triglyceride ) patient metabolic syndrome .
